Description: Glazed steatite scarab; glaze worn; pierced longitudinally; engraved elytra, head and legs and on the base a maat feather, uraeus and neb sign.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 283)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P38,46 Pl IV,XII)
